p: Black pepper Piper nigrum, rosemary Rosmarinus officinalis, eucalyptus blue gum Eucalyptus globulus, and tea tree Melaleuca alternifolia 100% pure essential oils were obtained from Essential Pure Natural Select Ingredient supplies (Range Products Pty. Ltd., Perth, Western Australia), which were extracted by steam distillation ( Table 5). Methanol 99.9% and hexane 97% were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (Australia), and acetone 99.5% and ethanol 99.0% were purchased from Asia Pacific Specialty Chemicals Ltd., NSW, Australia.
